00064   void clearPtsFiles (const int & num_parts,
00065                       const std::vector<int> & ranges) const
00066   {
00067     Controls & cs(Controls::instance());
00068     char filename[256];
00069     if (num_parts==1)
00070     {
00071       for (int j = min_section;j<=max_section;j++)
00072       {
00073         sprintf(filename,"%s%s%d.pts",cs.getOutputDir(),name.c_str(),j);
00074         FILE * F = fopen(filename,"w");
00075         if (!F) { printf("Couldn't open output file %s\n",filename); exit(0); }
00076         assert(F);
00077         fclose(F);
00078       }
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082       char temp[256];
00083       for (int i=0;i<num_parts;i++)
00084       {
00085         assert((2*i+1)<static_cast<int>(ranges.size()));
00086         for (int j=ranges[2*i];j<=ranges[2*i+1];j++)
00087         {
00088           sprintf(temp,"%s%s%s%d.pts",cs.getOutputDir(),name.c_str(),
00089                                           cs.getMultiPartSuffix(),j);
00090           sprintf(filename,temp,i);
00091           FILE * F = fopen(filename,"w");
00092           if (!F) { printf("Couldn't open output file %s\n",filename); exit(0); }
00093           assert(F);
00094           fclose(F);
00095         }
00096       }
00097     }
00098   }
00099
